code: import*as actionTypes from"./pageTypes";export var addToCart=function addToCart(itemId){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_TO_CART,payload:{id:itemId}};};export var removeFromCart=function removeFromCart(itemId){return{type:actionTypes.REMOVE_FROM_CART,payload:{id:itemId}};};export var updateQty=function updateQty(itemId,value){return{type:actionTypes.UPDATE_QTY,payload:{id:itemId,qty:value}};};export var loadClickedItems=function loadClickedItems(item){return{type:actionTypes.LOAD_CLICKED_ITEM,payload:{id:item}};};
